item.title: Joel Sarakula - Pacifico Waves
item.description:
When we start on our camino
Unconscious to our true desires
Experience pulls into focus
Some things are worth putting love on the line
I guess I have to keep on searching
Until I find my peace of mind
There’s a beach where I can show you
My endless summertime
The sound of the ocean gets me so high
Helps me remember what I left behind
I let them wash over
Pacifico waves roll by
Pacifico ease my mind
In these times of great upheaval
You need a steady hand to drive
I take the coast until the sunset
Know where you will land
Before you take a dive
Everybody looks for meaning
But can we satisfy our minds?
I’ve been washed up, dried up and lost at sea
Cause waves keep me mystified
The sound of the ocean gets me so high
Helps me remember what I left behind
I let them wash over
Pacifico waves roll by
Pacifico ease my mind
Pacifico Waves
Pacifico Waves
The sound of the ocean
Can you hear me calling?
Helps me remember
Cause you know I’m falling
I let them wash over
Pacifico waves roll by
Pacifico ease my mind
Pacifico waves roll by
Pacifico ease my mind
